title: Incorporate MÃ­mis Gildi Ops one by one
body:
This is to Incorporate `fluffle` reusable actions.
Once we have enough Ops in the main, 
we can run these subtasks as proper features,
happily bumping versions automatically.
author: rdd13r

title: IDEA -- Codacy Dashboard
body:
Mimis has shared dashboards for Codacy suggestions.
We would benefit from one too.
In the same space, in fact.
author: rdd13r

title: IDEA -- New User Greeting (Optional)
body:
Captain is very particular about having a new user greeting workflow.
Although I am not fully sold on the general value,
I do enjoy making a peer happy -- all the value I need to implement a fun flow.
author: rdd13r

title: IDEA -- Labeling Flow
body:
Mimis projects use a lot of Ops logic that is governed by labels.
One such example is about comments on blog posts,
And another is about phone reminders for Mimis.
Let's add automatic labeling?
We can hook it up here and make it smarter as we evolve.
author: rdd13r

title: IDEA -- Qodana Scan -- Important
body:
Qodana is a primary tool used by Mimis.
We should enable it, connect this project to the team's dashboard,
And let it live.
author: rdd13r

title: IDEA -- RENOVATE!
body:
Renovate dashboard is another place team goes to every day.
Let's enable it -- that should be straightforward. 

And fun!
author: rdd13r
